Uses of Class
org.joml.MatrixStack

    • Uses of MatrixStack in org.joml

      Methods in org.joml that return MatrixStack 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.clear()
      Dispose of all but the first matrix in this stack and set the stack counter to zero.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.frustum(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float zNear, float zFar)
      Apply an arbitrary perspective projection frustum transformation to the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.get(FloatBuffer dest)
      Store the current matrix into the supplied FloatBuffer at the current buffer position.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.get(int index, FloatBuffer dest)
      Store the current matrix into the supplied FloatBuffer starting at the specified absolute buffer position/index.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.loadIdentity()
      Set the current matrix to identity.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.loadMatrix(float[] columnMajorArray, int offset)
      Load the values of a column-major matrix from the given float array into the current matrix of the stack.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.loadMatrix(FloatBuffer columnMajorArray)
      Load the values of a column-major matrix from the given FloatBuffer into the current matrix of the stack.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.loadMatrix(Matrix4f mat)
      Load the given Matrix4f into the current matrix of the stack.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.lookAlong(float dirX, float dirY, float dirZ, float upX, float upY, float upZ)
      Apply a rotation transformation to the current matrix to make -z point along dir.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.lookAlong(Vector3f dir, Vector3f up)
      Apply a rotation transformation to the current matrix to make -z point along dir.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.lookAt(float eyeX, float eyeY, float eyeZ, float centerX, float centerY, float centerZ, float upX, float upY, float upZ)
      Apply a "lookat" transformation to the current matrix for a right-handed coordinate system, that aligns -z with center - eye.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.lookAt(Vector3f position, Vector3f centre, Vector3f up)
      Apply a "lookat" transformation to the current matrix for a right-handed coordinate system, that aligns -z with center - eye.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.multMatrix(Matrix4f mat)
      Post-multiply the given matrix mat against the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.ortho(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float zNear, float zFar)
      Apply an orthographic projection transformation to the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.perspective(float fovy, float aspect, float zNear, float zFar)
      Apply a symmetric perspective projection frustum transformation to the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.popMatrix()
      Decrement the stack pointer by one.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.pushMatrix()
      Increment the stack pointer by one and set the values of the new current matrix to the one directly below it.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.reflect(float nx, float ny, float nz, float px, float py, float pz)
      Apply a mirror/reflection transformation to the current matrix that reflects about the given plane specified via the plane normal and a point on the plane.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.reflect(Quaternionf orientation, Vector3f point)
      Apply a mirror/reflection transformation to the current matrix that reflects about a plane specified via the plane orientation and a point on the plane.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.reflect(Vector3f normal, Vector3f point)
      Apply a mirror/reflection transformation to the current matrix that reflects about the given plane specified via the plane normal and a point on the plane.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotate(AxisAngle4f angleAxis)
      Apply a rotation transformation, rotating about the given AxisAngle4f, to the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotate(float ang, float x, float y, float z)
      Apply rotation to the current matrix by rotating the given amount of degrees about the given axis specified as x, y and z component.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotate(float ang, Vector3f axis)
      Apply a rotation transformation to the current matrix by rotating the given amount of degrees about the given axis Vector3f.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotate(Quaternionf quat)
      Apply the rotation transformation of the given Quaternionf to the current matrix.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotateX(float ang)
      Apply rotation about the X axis to the current matrix by rotating the given amount of degrees.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotateY(float ang)
      Apply rotation about the Y axis to the current matrix by rotating the given amount of degrees.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.rotateZ(float ang)
      Apply rotation about the X axis to the current matrix by rotating the given amount of degrees.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.scale(float xyz)
      Apply scaling to the current matrix by uniformly scaling all unit axes by the given xyz factor.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.scale(float x, float y, float z)
      Apply scaling to the current matrix by scaling by the given x, y and z factors.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.scale(Vector3f xyz)
      Apply a scaling transformation to the current matrix by scaling by the factors in the given Vector3f.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.translate(float x, float y, float z)
      Apply a translation to the current matrix by translating by the given number of units in x, y and z.
      MatrixStack MatrixStack.translate(Vector3f xyz)
      Apply a translation to the current matrix by translating by the number of units in the given Vector3f.
